history.proof: intros m1 m2 m3 H. qsimpl time: 1 use: multTerm_ltT_l. hauto q: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) m1, m2, m3 : Term A n H : ltT m1 m2 Unable to unify "m2" with "m1".

In environment A : Set multA : A -> A -> A n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop H0 : forall m1 m2 m3 : Term A n, ltT m1 m2 -> ltT (multTerm multA (n:=n) m3 m1) (multTerm multA (n:=n) m3 m2) A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} m1, m2, m3 : Term A n H : ltT m1 m2 M1_min : forall x : mon n, ltM x (zero_mon n) -> False ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ltM x x -> False ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) A1_diff_A0 : eqA A1 A0 -> False eqA_ref : reflexive A eqA eqA_sym : symmetric A eqA eqA_trans : transitive A eqA plusA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c)) (plusA (plusA a b) c) plusA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a) plusA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c d) plusA_A0 : forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0) invA_plusA : forall a : A, eqA A0 (plusA a (invA a)) invA_eqA_comp : forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b) minusA_def : forall a b : A, eqA (minusA a b) (plusA a (invA b)) multA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c d) multA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (multA a (multA b c)) (multA (multA a b) c) multA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a) multA_dist_l : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA (multA c a) (multA c b)) (multA c (plusA a b)) multA_A0_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A0 a) A0 multA_A1_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a divA_rew : forall (a b : A) (nZ1 nZ2 : eqA b A0 -> False), divA a b nZ1 = divA a b nZ2 divA_is_multA : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b) divA_eqA_comp eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA (divA a c nZc) b) divA_invA_r : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZib : eqA (invA b) A0 -> False), eqA (divA a (invA b) nZib) (invA (divA a b nZb)) chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
eqT_refl: reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n))

Goal:
forall m1 m2 m3 : Term A n, ltT m1 m2 -> ltT (multTerm multA (n:=n) m1 m3) (multTerm multA (n:=n) m2 m3)

Premises:
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
eqT : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
reflexive : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop
ltT = fun a b : Term A n => ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) : Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
multTerm : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Term A n
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) |- Prop]
ssrbool.is_inleft : ?A + {?B} -> bool where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) |- Prop]
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) |- Prop]
inright : ?B -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) |- Prop]
inleft : ?A -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) |- Prop]

pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) |- Type]

minusTerm_eqT : forall (A : Set) (minusA : A -> A -> A) (n : nat) (m1 m2 : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) m1 m2 -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) m1 m2) m1

nzeroP_multTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)

T1_multTerm_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (T1 A1 n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
T1_multTerm_r : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (T1 A1 n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) b a)
moreCoefStructure.A_sep : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) A0 -> eqA a A0 \/ eqA b A0
multTerm_assoc : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) b c)) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) c)
multTerm_minusTerm_dist_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a c) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b c)) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) a b) c)
multTerm_plusTerm_dist_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a c) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b c)) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) c)
mult_invTerm_com_r : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a (invTerm invA (n:=n) b)) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b))
eqTerm_multTerm_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c d : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a c) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b d)
multTerm_com : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b a)
multTerm_plusTerm_dist_r : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) c a) (multTerm multA (n:=n) c b)) (multTerm multA (n:=n) c (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b))

```coq
intros m1 m2 m3 H.
apply multTerm_ltT_l.
apply H.
Qed.

original: intros m1 m2 m3 H. apply multTerm_ltT_l. apply H.
